telemetry.userPrompt: I want to find a telescope or similar device that I can sit on my porch and control it remotely and have the image show up live on my phone which I can cast to my TV. It needs to do stargazing but also give me cool visual zooms of buildings and roads 1-20 miles away because I can see the Nashville skyline from my house.
telemetry.researchPlan:
PRODUCT TYPE: Smart Telescopes & Remote-Viewing Optics
LIFECYCLE: Durable / Investment (5+ years)
YOUR PROFILE: Porch-mounted, phone-controlled, live to TV, dual-use (astro + terrestrial Nashville skyline)
PRODUCTS: 12 models across 5 brands, 3 tiers
KEY SPECS: Aperture, Focal Length, Sensor Resolution, FOV, Weight, Battery, Storage, Sensor
DERIVED METRICS: Price per mm aperture, MP per $1K
FLAGS: Ecosystem ✓, Multi-Use ✓, Features Matrix ✓, Clear Tiers ✓, Derived Metrics ✓
SECTIONS: Overview, Spec Comparison, Optics Deep Dive, Use Case Fit, Features Matrix, Recommendations, Sources

contentAnalysis.readabilityNote: Consumer-friendly product comparison with data-driven recommendations, interactive charts, and decision frameworks for dual-use smart telescope selection
